SENT.plain: Idiopathic dyserythropoiesis in a dog was characterized by chronic nonregenerative normocytic normochromic anemia, cellular marrow and abnormal morphology of erythroid precursors
Serum concentrations of Vitamin B(12), folate and iron were inconsistent with secondary causes of dyserythropoiesis
The disorder appeared to be distinct from myelodysplastic syndromes described previously
